description.value:
You gain an encounter attack power associated with your domain. This new power replaces the encounter attack power you gained at 13th level from your domain.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.4waGSjo3h6r2ORty]{Level 27 Corellon Domain Encounter Power}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.Mb9EFv06Z5QHNIyp]{Strikes of Woe and Weal}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.T0LeucUSdaQG1sW2]{Level 27 Death Domain Encounter Power}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.IWFkyCof0wSJG4A7]{Herald of Inevitable Doom}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.EuyG7TARF0x2QXOW]{Level 27 Domination Domain Encounter Power}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.vleq81pXuSQN2Djt]{Sundered Bravery}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.jvyTEImNiVA1sMux]{Level 27 Oghma Domain Encounter Power}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.15wOcSP4TNUxJfEK]{Thought Destroyer}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.TLJPGuoS6Ohv9DNW]{Level 27 Selûne Domain Encounter Power}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.nbJwYUAK9TtNh31p]{Staggering Moonglow}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.6GNvmPV1ZbxXW38z]{Level 27 Storm Domain Encounter Power}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.6ht4kWKqpjsOGuSX]{Thunder of the Dawn War}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.b2KuMDtXomZeUqgi]{Level 27 Sun Domain Encounter Power}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.j678MhDnJfOrs3IR]{Light of the First Dawn}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.z1x2jGcMb6U4VBwd]{Level 27 Torm Domain Encounter Power}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.HarWymT8qMQsKzVR]{Valorous Charge}
